name: Salesforce Setup Sidepanel
description: Enhances Salesforce productivity by providing quick access to Setup menu through Chrome's side panel. Navigate Salesforce setup pages efficiently without leaving your current tab.
author: Josh

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.salesforce.com https://*.force.com https://*.salesforce-setup.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; frame-ancestors 'none'
